name: Zebstrika
flavorText:
They have lightning-like movements.
When Zebstrika run at full speed,
the sound of thunder reverberates.

previous.name: Blitzle
previous.flavorText:
When thunderclouds cover the sky, it will appear.
It can catch lightning with its mane and store
the electricity.

next.name: Roggenrola
next.flavorText:
Its ear is hexagonal in shape.
Compressed underground,
its body is as hard as steel.
